DOC.brief_summary: The COBIS registry multi-center , real-world registry drug-eluting stenting coronary bifurcation lesion South Korea . The aim study find current status bifurcation drug-eluting stenting determine prognostic factor long-term outcome South Korea .
DOC.brief_title: Coronary Bifurcation Stenting ( COBIS ) Registry South Korea
DOC.criteria: Age > = 18 year Any type de novo bifurcation lesion parent vessel > = 2.5 mm side branch > = 2.0 mm visual estimation Treated drugeluting stent Cardiogenic Shock ST elevation MI within 48hours Expected survival less 1 year Left main bifurcation Allergy antiplatelets
